item.title: You Won't Believe Where the 2012 Summer Olympics Were Held!
item.description: Introduction The 2012 Summer Olympics, also known as the Games of the XXX Olympiad, were held in London, England from July 27th to August 12th. This event was historic for many reasons, as it was the first time the Olympics had been held in London since 1948 and the third time in the United Kingdom. The games were also the first Olympics to be held in the same year as the Paralympics.
